name: The Mysteries of the Past (FMP)
description: This is a vertical slice of what I would create if I had more time. The mysteries of the past takes place in Taizou, a mysterious village, where weird things begin to happen. Lady Reirise, the main leader of the village decides to find out about these events by going to the Taizou library. There she learns of the village's past and must defeat the evil in and around Taizou to save it before more disruptions happen...
